name: Beyond the Sky (itch) (Beyond Sexy)
description:
Every asset was made in the 48 hour period.

Your ship is heading towards a black hole. Luckily you're an omniscient AI and can easily avoid it - so long as your crew keep the right systems online.

But they'd probably rather, you know, play some games, or eat some toast.

And when you shut off power to their fun time activities - they might just shut off power to you. Damn technology.

More assets and systems were finished, but couldn't be brought to a game-ready state before the deadline; so look out for a future full release of Beyond the Sky!
